name: neutron-studio
description: Like WebStudio, but surrounded by Electrons. Aimed to be the in-studio front end for BAPSicle.

scripts.webstudio-install: cd WebStudio && git submodule update --init && yarn --network-timeout 100000
scripts.start: npm run webstudio-install && concurrently "cd WebStudio && BROWSER=none yarn start" "wait-on http://localhost:13502 && electron-forge start"
scripts.make: npm run webstudio-install && (rm -r webstudio-build || true) && cd WebStudio && yarn build && cp -r build ../webstudio-build && cd ../ && npm install && electron-forge make

author: Unversity Radio York
